alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Southern Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 2:10PM MST until February 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible with locally higher amounts especially in the Tushar Mountains and summits along I-15 and I-70. Blowing snow from wind gusts as high as 45 mph. Winds are forecast to be strongest Tuesday night through Wednesday. * WHERE...Central Mountains and Southern Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult on summits/passes. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
